faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions:

questions.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
questions.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 2 business days. For urgent matters, please call our office directly.

questions.question: Can I visit your offices without an appointment?
questions.answer: While we welcome visitors, we recommend scheduling an appointment to ensure the appropriate team members are available to meet with you.

questions.question: How can I apply for your programs?
questions.answer: Program applications can be submitted through our website. Visit the specific program page for application details and deadlines.

questions.question: I'm having technical issues with the website. Who can help?
questions.answer: Please email support@robertosavedreams.org with details about the issue you're experiencing, and our technical team will assist you.
